attributes.action: ensure that any MP involved in the Expenses Scandal is not elevated to the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the forthcoming General Election many MPs will be standing down for one reason or another. Many of these MPs will ask to be considered for a seat in the House of Lords, those caught up in the Expenses Scandal should not be elevated to the House of Lords as they are unsuitable for this honour.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
